## Gene Details:
- **MSU gene ID:** None  
- **RAPdb gene ID:** None  
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PMS1T</u>
- **Genome:**  [MSU7](http://rice.uga.edu/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[IRGSP-1.0](https://rapdb.dna.affrc.go.jp/download/irgsp1.html)
- **Species:** *Oryza sativa*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - A single nucleotide polymorphism in **PMS1T** nearby the miR2118 recognition site was critical for fertility change, likely leading to differential accumulation of the phasiRNAs.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [fertility](/tags/fertility/)

## Literature:
   - [PMS1T, producing phased small-interfering RNAs, regulates photoperiod-sensitive male sterility in rice](https://www.doi.org/10.1073/pnas.1619159114).&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.1073/pnas.1619159114](https://www.doi.org/10.1073/pnas.1619159114);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[27965387](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27965387/)
